dcterms:description: A benchmark for multi-agent reinforcement learning that involves various scenarios in the StarCraft II environment, allowing for the evaluation of algorithms in cooperative settings.
dcterms:title: SMAC (StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge)

dcterms:description: A novel reinforcement learning environment designed for training and evaluating agents in football scenarios, providing a rich set of challenges for multi-agent learning.
dcterms:title: Google Research Football (GRF)
